item.description:
Join us for a walking tour exploring the Victorian architecture and history of Ashmont Hill! Tickets are $15 per person ($6 for Boston By Foot members) and may be purchased directly from our guides (cash only). See the Boston By Foot web site for more information about this event or becoming a member.

Explore a wonderful area of Dorchester, a town even older than Boston. Ashmont Hill was the site of several Colonial estates eventually giving way to some of the finest examples of Victorian homes in this 19th century garden suburb.

See one of the finest Gothic Revival churches ever built in the United States, the site where Henry Knox slept while directing the movement of artillery up Dorchester Heights, and the neighborhood Mayor John Honey Fitz Fitzgerald and daughter Rose Kennedy once called home.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for a group of people with Boston By Foot bags, pins and shirts.
item.name: Walking Tour of Ashmont Hill
